Identity.History: The imperial monarchy known as the Kingdom of Hyrule is one of the longest-lived and most powerful empires to have existed. For nearly three-thousand years the Hylian people have rallied behind the banner of the winged Triforce, creating one of the largest and most successful armies the land has ever known.
